Name: malignant neoplasm of acoustic nerve
Definition: A lung disease that is defined as a recurrent or chronic collapse of the right middle lobe
Synonym: malignant tumour of acoustic vestibular nerve

Name: middle ear cancer
Definition: An auditory system cancer that is located_in the middle ear.

Name: auricular cancer
Definition: An auditory system cancer that is located_in the middle ear.

Name: inner ear cancer
Definition: An auditory system cancer that is located_in the middle ear.

Name: external ear cancer
Definition: A carcinoma that is consisting of spindle or giant cells (or both) combined with squamous cell carcinoma

Name: internal auditory canal meningioma
Definition: A phobic disorder that is characterized by an unreasonable or irrational fear related to exposure to specific objects or situations.
Synonym: meningioma of the Internal Auditory canal

Name: obsolete early onset breast ovarian cancer syndrome
Definition: A phobic disorder that is characterized by an unreasonable or irrational fear related to exposure to specific objects or situations.
Synonym: meningioma of the Internal Auditory canal

Name: internal auditory canal lipoma
Definition: A breast carcinoma that is characterized by an individual having breast cancer in both breasts
Synonym: Lipoma of the Internal Auditory canal
